Step Action: Click Continue button

Step Action: Click Continue button

Step Expected: Session expires. User is redirected to login page with session timeout message

Step Action: Confirm logout if confirmation dialog appears

Step Expected: User is logged out and redirected to login page. Session is cleared. Back button does not allow access to logged-in pages

Step Action: Enter wrong password: WrongPassword123 and click Continue

Step Action: Repeat step 2 for 5 consecutive times (total 5 failed attempts)

Step Action: Attempt to login with correct password
Step Expected: Account is locked. Error message indicates lockout. User cannot login even with correct password until lockout expires
